ygData.subject: Re: Back to the base
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She mumbled in her sleep while in the CR.  She dreamed that Land Mine was standing there and yelling at her.  She dreamed that Land Mine was blaming her

::KitKat::

She mumbled in her sleep while in the CR.  She dreamed that Land Mine 
was standing there and yelling at her.  She dreamed that Land Mine 
was blaming her for her death.  She screamed out,"I"M SORRY. I DID 
WHAT I THOUGHT WAS RIGHT! I'M SORRY."

She cried in her sleep.  She mumbled,"I'm sorry,  I'm sorry."

Her mind and spark were in complete torment. She was torn because she 
knew she ahd saved her friend, but kiling her friend hurt her more 
than she could have ever imagined.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> Still with KitKat in his arms, DrillBit reached the base. He saw the
> Maximals. He cut around to the side hatch, and entered. He placed 
KitKat
> in a CR tank. He stayed by it.
> 
> ::K-9::
> 
> K-9 got Terrorsaur in his sights, and opened fire.
